mapper.insert: insert into meeting (meetingname, roomid, reservationistid, numberofparticipants, starttime, endtime, reservationtime, canceledtime, description, status) values (#{meetingname}, #{roomid}, #{reservationistid}, #{numberofparticipants}, #{starttime}, #{endtime}, #{reservationtime}, #{canceledtime}, #{description}, #{status});
mapper.select: select m.meetingname,mr.roomname,m.starttime,m.endtime,m.reservationtime,e.employeename from meeting m,meetingroom mr,employee e where m.status = #{meeting.status} and m.roomid = mr.roomid and m.reservationistid = e.employeeid limit #{page},#{pagesize}
select count(*) from meeting where status = #{status};
